entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
